text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia capitata is a species in the genus Tillandsia. It is native to Mexico, Honduras, Cuba and the Dominican Republic.
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Bacchus'
Tillandsia 'Lorenzo'
Tillandsia 'Love Knot'
Tillandsia 'Marron'
Tillandsia 'Maya'
Tillandsia 'Old Gold'
Tillandsia 'Pink Velvet'
Tillandsia 'Red Fountain'
Tillandsia 'Rio Hondo'
Tillandsia 'Vicente Bacaya'
